short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Persistently hide any image (inappropriate, offensive, etc.) from the context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to persistently hide any image (inappropriate, offensive, etc.). Hidden images are remembered and hidden automatically on future visits to the the same site. It's simple. It just works.
